name: Dream of a heart in a mountain
name_original: Dream of a heart in a mountain
description:
At night you think you go to a mountain. You're not sure where or why but you go there. But now its too real and you can't leave unless you find the heart of the mountain.

2022 7 day roguelike. I wanted to toy with meta progression without meta progression. Which is to say you can make advances over multiple runs but you will eventually die and lose everything. Also had an idea for a "unique" look to the game iI may further expand upon this.
